text: Samantha Ferreira (born 7 December 1997) is a Brazilian water polo player. She was part of the Brazilian women's water polo team at the 2017 World Aquatics Championships and 2019 Pan American Games. == References == == Other websites == * water-polo-canadas-women-advance Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian water polo players
title: Samantha Ferreira
